content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL and warning “out of fuel”; contains ≈189.84 units of water at temperature 15; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); assigned fluid system [70662].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with status WORKING, delivering ≈99.26 units of water and linked to fluid system [70662].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 70662, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 70661, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 70674, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 70673, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 70669, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 70678, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 70677, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 70680, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 70681, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 70682, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within effective range, and share matching fluid system assignments.

• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before attempting to place any entity.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use precise position attributes during placement to avoid type-related errors.

• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify that candidate pipe groups possess the correct fluid system identifiers and are situated within the designated search radius.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Failures:
  - Repeated attempts to reposition the steam engine using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system IDs [69998, 70082, 70164, 70248, 70330, 70414, 70496, 70580] failed to locate any matching pipe groups within a 10-tile radius of Position(-5.5, 19.5). Consider expanding the search radius or revising the pipeline network configuration.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor fuel levels diligently and replenish boiler fuel promptly to avoid operational shutdown.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Assess environmental constraints and verify inventory levels before executing repositioning or pipeline attachment actions.
